trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around October 14th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving for quite a few hours with a friend through southern Oregon and we noticed a lot of starts were out. A light that could have been a distant satellite was traveling much too fast, started out high in the sky and the light throbbed as it descended toward the horizon. After this extra flash of light from the object it went faster and vanished behind the horizon. When I first saw the light I had to blink to make sure I wasn't seeing spots of light and then it was confirmed when my buddy saw the same thing. I thought it was a shooting star, but it left no trail and traveled too close to the earth to be one.
Summary: Light was traveling fast towards horizon for about 3-5 seconds.
